title: Secluded Escape in China's Daocheng Yading Scenic Area
description: Step into an enchanting landscape of rolling mountain ranges with a stay at Crowne Plaza Yading, an IHG Hotel. This blissful resort guarantees peaceful seclusion at an altitude of more than 2,800 metres above sea level, surrounded by ancient natural formations. Lose yourself in the magnificent scenery with a hike at the magnificent Yading Nature Reserve, before returning to your tranquil hotel to refuel with traditional dishes at Five Colour Lake restaurant and a soothing massage at the spa.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Yading, an IHG Hotel
